   contain the root `toctree` directive.

Welcome to JobPort's documentation!
===================================

JobPort was a project undertaken by students at IIIT - Delhi. It is a Platform for Colleges and Institutes, for placement use. The Portal is currently being used inside IIIT - Delhi actively and is open for development and use.

The project was developed in the care of Byld (Software Development Club) http://byld.iiitd.edu.in Read the Wiki https://github.com/IIIT-Delhi/placement/wiki to set up your local development environment. PRs are welcome!


Contents:

   :maxdepth: 2

   jobport
